title: PBE Client Problems
body:
I just got accepted into the PBE today. In the PBE Client itsaid it was "Updating". I waited for about a hour and it seemed like the download was finished but it kept on going. it is currently at 1748.4 MB/1750.0 MB. Also, it says on the bottom left corner ETA -64 MINS. Is this normal or is there something wrong with the client? I have been waiting for quite a while now and the client has yet to stop "Updating". I have already sent a support ticket but Riot has yet to reply. Has anyone here had this problem and managed to fix it somehow? Please reply if you 
do!

I want to test some things out on PBE! {{item:3070}} 

EDIT: It has been fixed! Im about to log in to PBE!

replies.body:
Depending on your connection and disk speed, patching can take some time. I'd continue to let it run, but if you notice it's still running in a while, or if you have any errors that pop up, let me know and I'll be happy to assist you.

Let me know if you have questions.
It is ETA -86 MINS and 1992.0 MB/ 1750.0 MB now, it is still running. should I restart it or keep on running it? I have been waiting for a few hours now.
Thanks! I will reply if it keep doing this. It currently still is :/
